mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART (CART_CODE, P_NUM, M_ID, CART_AMOUNT) VALUES (SEQ_CART_CODE.nextval, #{p_num}, #{m_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_CODE, C.M_ID, C.P_NUM, C.CART_AMOUNT, M.M_POINT, P.P_BUY_OK, P.P_COST, P.P_IMAGE, P.P_IMAGE_FOLDER, P.P_NAME, P.P_DISCOUNT, P.P_COMPANY FROM TBL_CART C INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON C.P_NUM = P.P_NUM INNER JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON C.M_ID = M.M_ID WHERE C.M_ID = #{m_id}
